review.title: “The experience is enriching.”
review.pros: Pros – LVLP gives their employees a chance to grow, preaches good professional ethics, and senior management mentor the staff well.
review.cons: Cons – Because the employees are treated like family, some staff take advantage of that priveledge.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – LVLP is the perfect company for me. I won't advice them anything except to keep up the good work
